reference.ref: GGamberger, D., Lavrac, N., Dzroski, S. (2000). Noise detection and elimination in data preprocessing: Experiments in medical domains. Applied Artificial Intelligence, 14(2), 205-223.

generalDescription.objective: To remove noisy instances from the training data.
generalDescription.howWork: It removes noisy instances from the training data by means of MDL principe.

parameterSpec.param: noiseSensitivity: to specify the noise sensitivity.
